text: (Va ʙa jod ovar ej Rasul,) hangome, ki Alloh az pajomʙaron pajmon girift, ki sumoro kitoʙu hikmat dodaam; sipas pajomʙare pesi sumo omad, ki tasdiqkunandai on ci, ki ʙo xud dored, ʙojad ʙo u imon ovared va uro jori kuned. Alloh farmud: "Ojo iqror dored va pajmoni maro ʙar on pazirufted?" Guftand: "Iqror kardem". Farmud: "Pas guvoh ʙosed va man ham ʙo sumo az guvohon hastam
